1. Advances Received from Customers includes dues to Related Parties which are disclosed in Annexure-AB.
2. Statutory Dues payable includes dues for PF & ESIC due to the following reasons:

a) Company is unable to deposit Provident Fund amounting Rs. 3.15 Lakhs as at March 31, 2025, Rs. 1.52 Lakhs as at March 31, 2024 & Rs. 0.23 Lakhs as at March 31, 2023 due to non-adherence of AADHAAR authentication of some employees.

b) Company is unable to deposit ESIC amounting Rs. 4.66 Lakhs as at March 31, 2025, Rs. 3.62 Lakhs as at March 31, 2024 & Rs. 2.50 Lakhs as at March 31, 2023 due to non-adherence of AADHAAR authentication of some employees."
